item.title: The protesters and residents pushing back on tourism in Barcelona
item.description: Hostility towards tourists in Spain grows as locals complain of being forced out of their own cities.

item.title: Zambian ex-president's family settle funeral row with government
item.description: The row caused consternation with some wondering how they should mourn former leader Edgar Lungu.

item.title: Australian police officer shot dead at rural property
item.description: The officer was undertaking "routine duties" when he was fired at by "a member of the public", police say.

item.title: Investigators find cockpit voice recorder from crashed Air India flight
item.description: The recovery of the recorder is a key step in uncovering what caused last week's deadly plane crash.

item.title: Man suspected of shooting Minnesota lawmakers arrested after huge manhunt
item.description: Vance Luther Boelter is accused of killing Democrat Melissa Hortman and her husband Mark, and injuring two others.
